website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Reago Pulse exceeded the expectations of consumers when it came to comfort and performance at the gym. Buyers also liked that it was lightweight yet durable. Though it was met with positive reviews, there were complaints that its upper lacked support. To sum it up, the comfortable and stylish design of the trainer worked in its favor as users highly recommended it.
pros: Almost all of the reviewers claimed that the Reebok Reago Pulse was very comfortable to wear for workouts and as everyday footwear
The trendy style and neutral colorways of the trainer appealed to a majority of the shoppers
Droves of owners liked how light the merchandise felt on the foot because their feet did not feel weighed down and tired at the end of a workout session
Many buyers thought that the trainer was reasonably priced if the quality build was considered
A lot of users noted that this model was true to size and width
Multiple fitness aficionados were ecstatic that the footgear was stable enough for weight training yet flexible to be used for other physical activities such as running and plyometrics
cons: More than a few testers disliked using the trainer for running or exercising because the upper did not feel supportive enough to hold the foot securely
The laces easily came untied which irked several people

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe... just watch your pricing!
customer_reviews.text: Product was great and shoes looked awesome, however had to return them as there was some black markings on one shoe. Wanted to go back and repurchase the shoes and the price jumped $50.00... so doesn’t look like I will be ordering anytime soon as I want my original price!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blatchley

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support
customer_reviews.text: You have to stay vertical all the time to avoid injury. In any oblique position your foot feels like tearing the upper part. Not enough support from the sides. Perfect for ankle injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Alephel

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes felt like I’d been wearing them for years but also brand new and comfortable. The material is stretchy and pliable and needed zero breaking in. Within two minutes I was used them and feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Uppercut

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe ! Gel sole too
customer_reviews.text: A very nice shoe ... very comfortable .. I will wear them soon !
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lazar

customer_reviews.title: brother approved
customer_reviews.text: made a great gift, brother used these shoes for the gym and loves them
customer_reviews.author: Areli Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Great value for what I paid.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these for the price paid ($33+/-). Comfortable and light weight. Nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Soots

customer_reviews.title: Great gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very light and comfortable, bumpy insole acts as a massager
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Wachowski

customer_reviews.title: light weight, cool, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes, 2nd pair light,comfortable and cool. great for traveling in hot areas.. love em
customer_reviews.author: donald deittrick

customer_reviews.title: The same a picture
customer_reviews.text: very good and comfortable, it looks good and is identical to the image
customer_reviews.author: Leissy Duran

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he loves them! He said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than the expected
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look good but the quality is not the best. Much bigger than the expected.
customer_reviews.author: David González Hidalgo

product_meta.title: Reebok mens CN7189 Reago Pulse
product_meta.description: Keep your eye on the prize in the Reebok® Reago Pulse training sneakers. Breathable mesh upper with synthetic overlays. Lace-up closure. Pull-tabs at the tongue and heel. Textile lining. Cushioned footbed. EVA midsole provides added cushioning. Rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 8 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
